data_write_interval.explanation: Interval to write data to file
data_write_interval.name: Data Write Interval

log_file_count.explanation: Number of rotating log files to keep
log_file_count.name: Log File Count

log_file_size.explanation: Max size of rotating log file
log_file_size.name: Log File Size

preferred_lock_detection_method.explanation: Specific method to use for screen lock detection
preferred_lock_detection_method.name: Preferred Lock Detection Method

time_files_dir.explanation: Directory where time files are stored
time_files_dir.name: Time Files Directory

timer_file_max_lines.explanation: Max lines in timer file before archiving
timer_file_max_lines.name: Timer File Max Lines

work_minutes.explanation: Duration of work before a break
work_minutes.name: Work Minutes
